wikipedia_page.main: Alasdair Henry Hutton OBE TD OStJ (born 19 May 1940, London) is a writer and narrator for public events and concerts, including the Royal Edinburgh Military Tattoo.

link_mentions.page: List of members of the European Parliament for the United Kingdom (1984–1989)
List of members of the European Parliament for the United Kingdom (1979–1984)

response: * Alasdair Hutton OBE TD, announcer, former journalist and politician
Divorced from Alasdair Hutton, former MEP, Hutton has two sons, Thomas and Nicholas Hutton. Her hobbies include gardening and chamber music.

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of Brisbane State High School
response: *Alasdair Hutton – Class of 1960 – Member of European Parliament, Author, Narrator

At the 1989 European Parliament election, Smith was elected for South of Scotland.  He won the seat from Alasdair Hutton, the Conservative incumbent in 1989, held it against a challenge from him in 1994, but stood down as an MEP in 1999.
